item.title: Elixir for aspiring Erlang developers
item.description: For the “Independent Coursework” of the University of Applied SciencesÂ Berlin I created the following presentation: **Elixir for aspiring Erlang developers ** from Torben Dohrn Target audience are students of the bachelors degree Computer Science of the University. If anything is unclear (or god forbid, wrong) drop me a mail or a tweet
